nodes.text: Sea eels were long, slimy, fish-like creatures that were native to Kamino. They had narrow eyes and huge mouths. Household sea eels were often fed sea-mice. They were one of several species of eel in the galaxy.
Boba Fett kept one as a pet. When he and his father Jango left Kamino in 22 BBY for the final time, Boba released his sea eel, but it was immediately devoured by a marine predator.
